interpretation: The "trumpet" card represents the need to speak up and make your voice heard. It's time to take action and make a bold statement, as this is a powerful time for communication and self-expression. This card also signifies a call to action, urging you to take charge and lead the way. With the "trumpet" card, it's important to trust your instincts and follow your passions, as this will lead to success and fulfillment. Some associated keywords include: confidence, leadership, communication, passion, and action. Trust your inner voice and let it guide you towards your goals.
